actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To provide for tribal demonstration projects for the integration of early childhood development, education, including Native language and culture, and related services, for evaluation of those demonstration projects, and for other purposes.
short_title: Tribal Early Childhood, Education, and Related Services Integration Act of 2016

titles.title: Tribal Early Childhood, Education, and Related Services Integration Act of 2016

To provide for tribal demonstration projects for the integration of early childhood development, education, including Native language and culture, and related services, for evaluation of those demonstration projects, and for other purposes.
